event.title: Cotelligent, inc.
event.text: Formerly known as Global Resources, Inc. Working as a consultant for NetKey, Inc. responsible for the development of e-business applications for marketing Web kiosks. VB6, COM, DCOM, ASP, JavaScript, DHTML, XML, Visual Source Safe, IIS 4/5, MTS, SQL Server and Access.

event.title: Netkey, Inc.
event.text:
Software Engineer, responsible for the development of e-business applications for multi-channel websites and marketing Web kiosks.
  VB6, COM, DCOM, ASP, JavaScript,  DHTML, XML, Visual Source Safe, IIS 4/5, MTS, SQL Server and Access.

event.title: Avinon, Inc.
event.text: Software Engineer, development of dynamic web services that enabling a variaty of workflows. VB6, COM+, ASP, JavaScript, DHTML, XML, SOAP, Visual Source Safe, IIS 5, COM+, SQL Server 2000.

event.title: VADO, Inc.
event.text: Software Engineer working as a consultant for several clients. C#, Office SDK, ASP.NET, ADO.NET, JavaScript, VBScript, DHTML, XML3.0, Index Server, IIS5, SQL Server 2000, Wise Solutions, Windows Installer, SMS2.0, Oracle 9.02, and MS Share Point Services.

event.title: ChevronTexaco, Inc.
event.text: Software Engineer, automation programming for software integration and distribution, C#, ASP.NET, Wise Solutions, VBScript, XML3.0, Windows Installer, SMS2.0.

event.title: E & J Gallo Winery, Inc.
event.text: Software Engineer, analysis and development of an intranet application to centralize documentation, administration and custom solutions for Microsoft Share Point, C#, ASP.NET, JavaScript, VBScript, Wise Solutions, Windows Installer, SMS2.0, and MS Share Point Services.

event.title: Microsoft Certified .Net Solution's Architecture
event.text: Certification in Analyzing Requirements and Defining Microsoft .NET Solution Architectures.

event.title: Levi Strauss & Co.
event.text: Software Engineer, responsible for maintaining a manufacturing application, ensuring scalability and availability. C#, ASP.NET, and Oracle.

event.title: XOMA (US), LLC.
event.text: Systems Administrator, Analyze and provide recommendations for best practices in the acquisition, development, and maintenance of company's systems. Support in the implementation of diverse workflows ensuring security, performance, and best practices.

event.title: School Apparel, Inc.
event.text: Software Engineer, Development of a B2B site, build transactional processing for a reliable eCommerce, add email notifications, and dynamic reporting (C#/VB.NET, Crystal Reports for AS400 DB2 database).

event.title: Levi Strauss & Co.
event.text: Senior Software Engineer, Development several modules to manage manufacturing costs and off-line services for data synchronization. Modular design based on tiers using web services (C#, Oracle).

event.title: A+ School Apparel, Inc.
event.text: Senior Software Engineer, Re-engineering company’s e-commerce website for better data access, performance, strong security, and portability (easy to maintain), (C#, jQuery, JavaScript, iSeries).

event.title: Direct Technology, Inc.
event.text: Working for Pacific Gas & Electric, Inc. (PG&E) as a Senior .Net Developer Lead, Provide know-how and hands-on to build an automated process to distribute software (C#). •Integrate a deployment process to sync binaries and data on portable devices when docked in stations (C#, network administration scripting).

event.title: Ancestry.com
event.text: Senior Software Engineer, delivering engaging applications for Ancestry customers to explore their Historical records and DNA Ethnicity, supporting responsive design for mobile, customer behavior tracking, AB testing, automated testing, and monitoring (Omniture/Mixpanel, Selenium, and NewRelic). C#, MVC, Rzor, Angular, JQuery, AJAX, CSS 3.0, TDD, SQL Server, TFS, Continous Integration, Chef Technologies.

event.title: Ancestry.com
event.text: Staff Software Engineer / Scrum Master, implementing large-scale single-page applications and enterprise software development with integration to cloud services. React, Node, Redux, JS ES6, Webpack, Jest, SASS, and Java. CI/CD with Jenkins, Docker, Harness, and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
